subject: Child Abuse and Neglect
Sex Crimes
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: A lawyer for an alleged victim in the Penn State child sexual abuse case said Jerry Sandusky’s recent comments on television had emboldened his client to testify against him.
snippet: A lawyer for an alleged victim in the Penn State child sexual abuse case said Jerry Sandusky’s recent comments on television had emboldened his client to testify against him.
